statements: DELETE FROM in_game_transactions WHERE player_id = 100 AND game_id = 200;
DELETE FROM in_game_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100 AND player_id = 50
DELETE FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date < '2022-01-01' AND amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'purchase';
DELETE FROM financial_reports WHERE total_revenue > 100000.00 AND report_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 500 AND transaction_type = 'deposit';
DELETE FROM virtual_currency_transactions WHERE player_id = 1001 AND transaction_id = 500;
DELETE FROM in_game_purchases WHERE game_title = 'Fortnite' AND purchase_amount > 50.00;
